thread.title: Pleasant Hotel 15 mins from the Eifel Tower
thread.title_full: Pleasant Hotel 15 mins from the Eifel Tower - Review of Mercure Paris Tour Eiffel Pont Mirabeau, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: eskimo22
title: Pleasant Hotel 15 mins from the Eifel Tower
text: Stayed here in March booked it last minute on lastminute.com it was a nice hotel. Room was pretty small but we only really sleep in there so it suited us fine. Main chain hotel so everything was pretty standard. Five minutes from a big indoor shopping mall which was handy on the first day when it was throwing it down. Was about fifteen minute walk to the tower and a few minutes from a metro stop.
